summary: August 31 is the 243rd day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Emily Harris  was, along with her husband William Harris , a member of the Symbionese Liberation Army , a leftist United States group involved in bank robberies, kidnapping and murder. In the 1970s, she was convicted of kidnapping Patty Hearst. In 2003, she was convicted of murder in the second degree for being the shooter in a 1975 slaying that occurred while she and other SLA members were robbing a bank in California. She was sentenced to eight years in prison for the murder.
title: Emily Harris
